content: soft cozy warm l-o-n-g all the things a super scarf should be ***this pattern is available for free on my website visit pattern website link above or you can download it here on ravelry as a printable ad-free pdf *** **difficulty ** easy **materials needed ** 5 5mm i hook 500-525 yards of worsted weight yarn yarn needle scissors **stitches used ** chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch **additional terms ** stitching in the 3rd loop of half_double_crochet after turning work all stitches for that row in the 3rd loop of the half_double_crochet from previous row it will be in the front instructions look at the top of the stitch and locate the sideways v bend the stitch to look at the back and you should see another v you ll be working into the back loop of that v this is called the 3rd loop **measurements ** 8 ft long 5 ft 6 ft by 6 wide
